languages.text: "Я не жалела и не жалею о том, что убила ее. Теодора поддалась Архиврагу, темному колдовству, все нападение на корабль было лишь дележом добычи между ней и Кунрадом. И я поняла это сердцем, едва увидев артефакт в ее руках".

traits.locale_text: "Я не жалела и не жалею о том, что убила ее. Теодора поддалась хаосу, темному колдовству, все нападение на корабль было лишь дележом добычи между ней и Кунрадом. И я поняла это сердцем, едва увидев артефакт в ее руках".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to the Archenemy and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."
languages.original_text: "Я не жалела и не жалею о том, что убила ее. Теодора поддалась Архиврагу, темному колдовству, все нападение на корабль было лишь дележом добычи между ней и Кунрадом. И я поняла это сердцем, едва увидев артефакт в ее руках".

traits.locale_text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to Chaos and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir disagreeing over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女を殺したことは今でも後悔していないわ。シオドーラは渾沌の勢力に屈してしまった。船への攻撃はすべて、彼女とボイトヴィルが戦利品をめぐって争った結果にすぎない。彼女の手にあるアーティファクトを見た瞬間、私は心の中でそれを悟ったのよ」
languages.original_text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to the Archenemy and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女を殺したことは今でも後悔していないわ。シオドーラは渾沌の勢力に屈してしまった。船への攻撃はすべて、彼女とボイトヴィルが戦利品をめぐって争った結果にすぎない。彼女の手にあるアーティファクトを見た瞬間、私は心の中でそれを悟ったのよ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我并不后悔杀了她，直到如今我也不后悔。西奥多拉投靠了混沌大敌，得到了邪恶巫术的力量。因此，那场袭击不过是她和维特威尔在争夺战利品而已。当我看到她手中的那件造物时，我就立刻明白了这点。”
languages.original_text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to the Archenemy and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."

traits.locale_text: “我并不后悔杀了她，直到如今我也不后悔。西奥多拉投靠了混沌，得到了巫术的力量。因此，那场袭击不过是她和维特威尔在争夺战利品而已。当我看到她手中的那件造物时，我就立刻明白了这点。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Ni me arrepentí de haberla matado en su momento ni lo hago ahora. Theodora había sucumbido al Archienemigo y a su hechicería oscura. Todo el ataque a la nave no fue más que el resultado de una disputa entre Voigtvir y ella por su botín. Me di cuenta en el momento en el que vi el artefacto en su mano».
languages.original_text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to the Archenemy and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."

traits.locale_text: «Ni me arrepentí de haberla matado en su momento ni lo hago ahora. Theodora había sucumbido al Archienemigo y a su hechicería oscura. Todo el ataque a la nave no fue más que el resultado de una disputa entre Voigtvir y ella por su botín. Me di cuenta en el momento en el que vi el artefacto en su mano».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe es nicht bereut, sie getötet zu haben. Und ich bereue es noch immer nicht. Theodora hatte sich dem Erzfeind und seiner dunklen Hexerei hingegeben. Zu dem Angriff auf dem Schiff ist es überhaupt nur gekommen, weil sie und Voigtvir sich um ihre Beute gestritten haben. Und in dem Moment, in dem ich das Artefakt in ihrer Hand gesehen habe, habe ich das in meinem Herzen erkannt."
languages.original_text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to the Archenemy and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe es nicht bereut, sie getötet zu haben. Und ich bereue es noch immer nicht. Theodora hatte sich dem Chaos und seiner dunklen Hexerei hingegeben. Zu dem Angriff auf dem Schiff ist es überhaupt nur gekommen, weil sie und Voigtvir sich um ihre Beute gestritten haben. Und in dem Moment, in dem ich das Artefakt in ihrer Hand gesehen habe, habe ich das in meinem Herzen erkannt."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas regretté d'avoir tiré à ce moment-là, et je ne le regrette toujours pas aujourd'hui. Théodora avait succombé au Grand Ennemi et à ses maléfices. Si le vaisseau a été attaqué, c'est uniquement parce qu'elle et Voigtvir se disputaient un butin. Et je l'ai compris à l'instant même où j'ai vu cet artefact dans sa main. »
languages.original_text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to the Archenemy and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas regretté d'avoir tiré à ce moment-là, et je ne le regrette toujours pas aujourd'hui. Théodora avait succombé au Chaos et à ses maléfices. Si le vaisseau a été attaqué, c'est uniquement parce qu'elle et Voigtvir se disputaient un butin. Et je l'ai compris à l'instant même où j'ai vu cet artefact dans sa main. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Onu öldürdüğüme pişman değildim. Hâlâ değilim. Theodora, Şerbaşı'na ve onun kara büyüsüne teslim olmuştu. Gemiye yapılan saldırının tek sebebi, onun ve Voigtvir'in didişmesiydi. Eseri elinde görür görmez bu vaziyetin farkına varmıştım."
languages.original_text: "I did not regret killing her, nor do I regret it now. Theodora had succumbed to the Archenemy and its dark sorcery. The entire attack on the ship was merely the result of her and Voigtvir feuding over their spoils. And I realised it in my heart the moment I saw the artefact in her hand."

traits.locale_text: "Onu öldürdüğüme pişman değildim. Hâlâ değilim. Theodora, Şerbaşı'na ve onun kara büyüsüne teslim olmuştu. Gemiye düzenlenen saldırının tek sebebi, onun ve Voigtvir'in didişmesiydi. Eseri elinde görür görmez bu vaziyetin farkına varmıştım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
